verses.verse: Ah, <S%H1945><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the rustling <S%H6767><s%> of wings, <S%H3671><s%> which is beyond <S%H5676><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> of Ethiopia; <S%H3568><s%>

that sends <S%H7971><s%> ambassadors <S%H6735><s%> by the sea, <S%H3220><s%> even in vessels <S%H3627><s%> of papyrus <S%H1573><s%> on <S%H6440><s%> the waters, <S%H4325><s%> saying, <S%H3212><s%> "Go, you swift <S%H7031><s%> messengers, <S%H4397><s%> to a nation <S%H1471><s%> tall <S%H4900><s%> and smooth, <S%H4178><s%> to a people <S%H5971><s%> awesome <S%H3372><s%> from their beginning onward, <S%H1973><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> that measures out <S%H6978><s%> and treads down, <S%H4001><s%> whose land <S%H776><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> divide! <S%H958><s%>"

All you inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the world, <S%H8398><s%> and you dwellers <S%H7931><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> when a banner <S%H5251><s%> is lifted up <S%H5375><s%> on the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> look! <S%H7200><s%> When the trumpet <S%H7782><s%> is blown, <S%H8628><s%> listen! <S%H8085><s%>

For <S%H3541><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H8252><s%> "I will be still, and I will see <S%H5027><s%> in my dwelling place, <S%H4349><s%> like clear <S%H6703><s%> heat <S%H2527><s%> in sunshine, <S%H216><s%> like a cloud <S%H5645><s%> of dew <S%H2919><s%> in the heat <S%H2527><s%> of harvest. <S%H7105><s%>"

For before <S%H6440><s%> the harvest, <S%H7105><s%> when the blossom <S%H6525><s%> is over, <S%H8552><s%> and the flower <S%H5328><s%> becomes a ripening <S%H1580><s%> grape, <S%H1155><s%> he will cut off <S%H3772><s%> the sprigs <S%H2150><s%> with pruning hooks, <S%H4211><s%> and he will cut down <S%H8456><s%> and take away <S%H5493><s%> the spreading branches. <S%H5189><s%>

They will be left <S%H5800><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> for the ravenous birds <S%H5861><s%> of the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and for the animals <S%H929><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%> The ravenous birds <S%H5861><s%> will summer <S%H6972><s%> on them, <S%H929><s%> and all the animals of the earth <S%H776><s%> will winter on them. <S%H2778><s%>

In that time, <S%H6256><s%> a present <S%H7862><s%> will be brought <S%H2986><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> from a people <S%H5971><s%> tall <S%H4900><s%> and smooth, <S%H4178><s%> even from a people <S%H5971><s%> awesome <S%H3372><s%> from their beginning onward, <S%H1973><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> that measures out <S%H6978><s%> and treads down, <S%H4001><s%> whose land <S%H776><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> divide, <S%H958><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> of the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> Mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion. <S%H6726><s%>
